mapper.select: select la.id, la.status lease_status, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.source_type, la.rent, ai.name apartment_name, ri.room_number, gi.name, gi.url, la.status=2 and cnt.signed=1 and cnt.renewing=0 is_renewable from lease_agreement la left join apartment_info ai on la.apartment_id = ai.id left join room_info ri on la.room_id = ri.id left join graph_info gi on ri.id = gi.item_id and item_type = 2 left join (select sum(if(status = 2, 1, 0)) signed, sum(if(status = 7, 1, 0)) renewing from lease_agreement where is_deleted = 0 and phone = #{phone}) cnt on true where la.is_deleted = 0 and gi.is_deleted = 0 and la.phone = #{phone}
